trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: ActiveX 컨트롤의 컨트롤 배열을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `BaseOCXArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 ActiveX control array.
trans-unit.target: `BaseOCXArray` 클래스 Visual Basic 6.0 ActiveX 컨트롤 배열의 런타임 기능에 대 한 프로그램 항목을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 컨트롤 배열의 디자인 타임 기능을 제공 하지는 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 함수 및 개체는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>네임 스페이스를 Visual Basic 6.0에서의 업그레이드 도구에서 사용 하기 위해 제공 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 경우에서 이러한 함수 및 개체에 다른 네임 스페이스에서 찾을 수 있는 기능이 중복 됩니다.는 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 필요한 지만 때 Visual Basic 6.0 코드 모델이 크게 다릅니다에서 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a `BaseOCXArray`, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스화하는 경우는 `BaseOCXArray`를 호출 해야는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>배열에 있는 초기 요소를 만드는 메서드를.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 함수 및 개체는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>네임 스페이스를 Visual Basic 6.0에서의 업그레이드 도구에서 사용 하기 위해 제공 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""></xref> class, specifying its container.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""> </xref> 컨테이너를 지정 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a `BaseOCXArray`, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스화하는 경우는 `BaseOCXArray`를 호출 해야는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>배열에 있는 초기 요소를 만드는 메서드를.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*>속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>프로그래밍 방식으로 수정 되거나 사용자 상호 작용 하 여 속성이 변경 될.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: 입력된 포커스가 컨트롤을 벗어나면 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 키보드 (TAB, SHIFT + TAB 등)를 사용 하 여 또는 호출 하 여 포커스를 변경 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>메서드, 포커스 이벤트가 다음 순서 대로 발생: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>마우스를 사용 하거나 호출 하 여 포커스를 변경 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>메서드, 포커스 이벤트가 다음 순서 대로 발생: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses or gains mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤이 마우스 캡처를 잃거나 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseDown` `Click` `MouseClick` `MouseUp` Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: 다음과 같은 일련의 컨트롤에서 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다 일반적으로 포인터가 모양 위에 있을 때 마우스 단추를 클릭 하면: `MouseDown` `Click` `MouseClick` `MouseUp` 두 발생 시간 내에 사용자의 운영 체제의 마우스 설정에서 결정 된 대로 됩니다 차례는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>이벤트 대신 두 번째 `MouseClick` 이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>이벤트는 컨트롤의 이벤트를 논리적으로 더 높은 수준의.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 이벤트는 대개 컨트롤에 포커스가 있을 때 ENTER 키를 누르는 것과 같은 다른 작업에 의해 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 크기를 조정 하는 경우 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 결정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>크기가 조정된 된 컨트롤의 캐스팅할 수 있습니다는 `sender` 의 매개 변수는 <xref:System.EventArgs>데이터를 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>가져오고, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>속성 (또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>속성 개별적으로).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 레이아웃을 처리 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>대신 이벤트는 `Resize` 이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>에 대 한 응답 이벤트는 사용자가 `Resize` 이벤트 뿐만 아니라 다른 변경 사항에 따라 컨트롤의 레이아웃에 영향을 주는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 완료 되 면 발생 유효성을 검사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>를 호출 하 여 키보드 (TAB, SHIFT + TAB 등)를 사용 하 여 포커스를 변경 하면 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>방법을 현재 양식에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>속성을 설정 하 여 포커스 이벤트가 다음 순서 대로 발생 하거나: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>마우스를 사용 하 여 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>메서드를 호출 하 여 포커스를 변경 하면, 포커스 이벤트가 다음 순서 대로 발생: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>속성이로 설정 된 경우 `false` 는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating>및 `Validated` 이벤트는 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성은 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>로 설정 된 `true` 에 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating>후 일반적으로 발생 하는 모든 이벤트, 이벤트 대리자는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating>이벤트는 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 유효성을 검사할 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> `Validating` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validated> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> `Validating` `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the `Validating` and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>를 호출 하 여 키보드 (TAB, SHIFT + TAB 등)를 사용 하 여 포커스를 변경 하면 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>방법을 현재 양식에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>속성을 설정 하 여 포커스 이벤트가 다음 순서 대로 발생 하거나: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> `Validating` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validated><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>마우스를 사용 하 여 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>메서드를 호출 하 여 포커스를 변경 하면, 포커스 이벤트가 다음 순서 대로 발생: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> `Validating` `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>속성이로 설정 된 경우 `false` 는 `Validating` 및 `Validated` 이벤트는 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성은 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>로 설정 된 `true` 에 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating>후 일반적으로 발생 하는 모든 이벤트, 이벤트 대리자는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating>이벤트는 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 함수 및 개체는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>네임 스페이스를 Visual Basic 6.0에서의 업그레이드 도구에서 사용 하기 위해 제공 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 경우에서 이러한 함수 및 개체에 다른 네임 스페이스에서 찾을 수 있는 기능이 중복 됩니다.는 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 필요한 지만 때 Visual Basic 6.0 코드 모델이 크게 다릅니다에서 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 구현 합니다.
